June 15, 2019 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmans-festival-class-a
Journey into Freedom
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Hymn: The Lord Bless You and Keep You (Nik & Emma Pears arr. Paul Sharman) 1. Roche Brass (David Johnson) — 96 2. Camborne Town (David Hirst) — 95 3. St Austell Town (Derek Greenwood) — 94 Best Player Award: Tim Joslin (Eb Bass) — Camborne Town
June 19, 2018, 1:52 p.m. Dec. 4, 2019, 4:33 p.m.
1 Camborne Town Band David Hirst
2 St. Dennis Band Darren R. Hawken
3 Roche Brass David Johnson
4 St. Austell Town Band Derek Greenwood
